cons: Not enough is known about the use of bamboo during pregnancy and breast-feeding. Stay on the safe side and avoid use.
description: Bamboo shoots are one of the very low-calorie vegetables. 100 grams of fresh cane holds just only 27 calories.

Bamboo shoots are also rich in the B-complex group of vitamins such as thiamin, riboflavin, niacin, vitamin B-6(pyridoxine), and pantothenic acid those are essential for optimum cellular enzymatic and metabolic functions.
Bamboo shoots compose excellent levels of potassium. Potassium is an important component of cell and body fluids that helps controlling heart rate and blood pressure by countering effects of sodium.
name: Bamboo Shoots
pros: Bamboo shoots are one of the very low-calorie vegetables. 100 grams of fresh cane holds just only 27 calories.

Bamboo shoots are also rich in the B-complex group of vitamins such as thiamin, riboflavin, niacin, vitamin B-6(pyridoxine), and pantothenic acid those are essential for optimum cellular enzymatic and metabolic functions.
Bamboo shoots compose excellent levels of potassium. Potassium is an important component of cell and body fluids that helps controlling heart rate and blood pressure by countering effects of sodium.
Bamboo shoot contains high fiber which has significant role in reducing cholesterol in the blood.
Phytonutrients that contained in bamboo shoot has important role in maintaining heart function.
Bamboo shoots are low in calories and fat also high in fiber.
Antioxidant is one of vital substance that can prevent the body from oxidative stress which caused by free radicals. Oxidative stress can lead the damage of DNA and causing cancer.
Fiber is well known for its effectiveness in relieve constipation.
